description: Provides ability to preview RST documents.
Double click in the rst preview to switch to the editor.
rst.preview.markEditorSelection.desc: Mark the current editor selection in the rst preview.
rst.preview.scrollEditorWithPreview.desc: When a rst preview is scrolled, update the view of the editor.
rst.preview.scrollPreviewWithEditor.desc: When a rst editor is scrolled, update the view of the preview.
rst.preview.title: Open Preview
rst.previewSide.title: Open Preview to the Side
rst.showLockedPreviewToSide.title: Open Locked Preview to the Side
rst.showSource.title: Show Source
rst.showPreviewSecuritySelector.title: Change Preview Security Settings
rst.trace.desc: Enable debug logging for the rst extension.
rst.preview.refresh.title: Refresh Preview
rst.preview.toggleLock.title: Toggle Preview Locking
rst.preview.docutilsWriter.desc: The docutils writer that will generate the output
